name: FNaF at Silly's
description:
You are The Nightguard/Paul Fitzgerald/Parker Jimmy Anderson/Goddamn Whatever. You go to Silly's for a paycheck, but oh no! Silly and the lads are ANGRY for some reason, and they want to KILL YOU. Survive... or not.

  • Gameplay
  • A Story
  • Poking fun at FNaF and it's fangames (Somewhat)
  • Gary Coleman
  • An overdecorated office
  • SCARY JUMPSCARES!
  • The most uncreative mechanics ever put into a FNaF Fangame

JCCO2468, Djoof  - Overall support, motivation and such.

Raytheree  - Major help with coding in some areas.

Scott Cawthon  - Creating the FNaF Series

AnimatorXP  - Creating the Five Nights at Pingas series (Overall inspiration)

DMZPlastix, DaMilk and Djoof  - Testing the game!
